text: Ezɨ mɨdorozir gumaziba Ahasian otarim Joas mɨsoghezɨ an aremezir puvatɨ. Me kamaghɨn fozir puvatɨ, Atrivim Joramɨn guivim Jehoseba ko Atrivim Ahasian buaramizim, moga Joas inigha amizir an ganamim, ko aning isa danganir me daguivsiaba arɨzimɨn aven aning modo. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Atalia Joas mɨsoghezɨ an aremezir puvatɨ.
